title: Great remake
review: I was a little skeptical at first but was blown away by the performance of skarsgaard and the redirection of this movie. Watch the original, of course. But definitely make time to see this one afterwards. You won't be disappointed. Can't wait for part 2.

title: More confusing than anything
review: Unfortunately, for me, the story fell short. Looks like Peele is walking down the shyamalan path. The action sequences and artistic direction were noteworthy but it left you scratching your head more than anything.

title: DC finally has a winner
review: DC has finally hit the big time with this Marvel-esque rendition of Aquaman. Definitely worth watching a couple of times.

title: Great movie
review: Best in the Captain America storyline. Got to love the addition of several core and newcomer Avengers.

title: Great. Just great!!
review: Absolutely outstanding end to the saga. The climactic ending was worth the 3 hour wait.

title: Breathtaking
review: This movie truly hits home and stays there. One of the best movies I've seen in a while. Yes, it's violent but what happened there was even worse. This movie did a great job in re-telling such a tragic event.
